EmailTemplate.name: Independent's Guide.IG General Release
EmailTemplate.subject: Discover the groundbreaking new tool for independent consultants
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, You spoke, we listened.
Using input from the 16.9 million-strong independent community, we have created The Independent's Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide> to help you overcome any hurdles you may face while on your journey as an independent worker. The Guide provides free, relevant advice with tools, templates, videos, 100+ pages of downloadable guides and 30+ articles and blogs. We invite you to explore each phase of the independent work process - Plan <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/plan>, Launch <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/launch>, Succeed <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/succeed> and Grow <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/grow>. The content is continuously being updated and added to, so follow along as we continue to provide education to help you succeed. ___________________________________ MBO Partners Public Relations
t: 703-793-6000 e: publicrelations@mbopartners.com <mailto:publicrelations@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
